meanings.sent1: After losing weight, she started reenlarging her wardrobe.
meanings.sent2: The balloon was reenlarging as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was reenlarging his collection of rubber bands to prepare for a giant slingshot competition.
meanings.sent4: The city was reenlarging its borders, swallowing up nearby towns in its expansion.
meanings.sent5: The artist was reenlarging the painting to add more detail and depth.

meanings.definition: To increase in size once more.
meanings.sent1: The baker was reenlarging the cake to make it big enough for the party.
meanings.sent2: The plant was reenlarging its leaves after a period of growth.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept reenlarging itself every time it saw a mouse, pretending to be bigger than it was.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds were reenlarging, casting a shadow over the entire valley.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's muscles were reenlarging with each workout, becoming stronger and more defined.
